-----------------------------------------------
Joomla\\CMS\\Cache\\Storage\\CacheStorageHelper
-----------------------------------------------

.. php:namespace: Joomla\\CMS\\Cache\\Storage

.. php:class:: CacheStorageHelper

    Cache storage helper functions.

    .. php:attr:: group

        :type: string

        Cache data group

    .. php:attr:: size

        :type: string

        Cached item size

    .. php:attr:: count

        :type: integer

        Counter

    .. php:method:: __construct($group)

        Constructor

        :param $group:

    .. php:method:: updateSize($size)

        Increase cache items count.

        :param $size:
        :returns: void
